objects.name: Identify gap areas
objects.description: Leadership identifies gap areas that generate a compelling need to generate a Key Intelligence Topic (KIT) or Key Intelligence Question (KIQ). (Citation: ODNIIntegration) (Citation: ICD115)

external_references.description: Office of the Director of National Intelligence. (n.d.). Intelligence Integration - Who Are We. Retrieved March 2, 2017.
Office of the Director of National Intelligence. (2012, December 21). ICD 115: Intelligence Community Capability Requirements Process. Retrieved March 2, 2017.

objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: Normally, defender is unable to detect.  Few agencies and commercial organizations may have unique insights.
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Normal aspect of adversary planning lifecycle.  May not be done by all adversaries.
